price: Nosotros creíamos que ni los seres humanos ni los yinnes dirían mentiras acerca de Dios,
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan taqūla al-insu wal-jinu ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban
